New Records: Payton Pritchard made a three-pointer that moved him ahead of Avery Bradley in all-time three-pointers made for the Celtics.
Key Match Events: Indiana opened the game with a 6-0 lead after making their first three shots.
Jaylen Brown scored five straight points to cut the Pacers' lead to four.
Payton Pritchard drilled a three-pointer to give Boston its first lead of the game.
The Pacers responded with a 5-0 run, but Pritchard scored again to retake the lead.
Jaylen Brown made a game-winning three-pointer to retake the lead for Boston.
The Pacers went on a 13-0 run in the final quarter to secure the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pacers dominated the paint, scoring 66 points compared to Boston's 33.
The game was close throughout, with the Pacers pulling away in the end.
